name: Zombie Commander
description: Zombie Commander is a strategy game about bringing the extinction of humanity by a zombies invasion, and lead the apocalpyse !
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 10 Processor: 1.5Ghz Memory: 4 GB RAM DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 50 MB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
